links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, 1).
formula: From _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 31 2008: (Start)G.f.: (4+9*x)/(1-x-x^2).a(n) = term (1,1) in the 1x2 matrix [4,9] . [1,1; 1,0]^n. (End)
mathematica: a={};b=4;c=13;AppendTo[a, b];AppendTo[a, c];Do[b=b+c;AppendTo[a, b];c=b+c;AppendTo[a, c], {n, 4!}];a (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Sep 17 2008 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
